solution_line_template: He needs to earn $150 more dollars because {playstation_cost} - {birthday_money} - {christmas_money} = <<{playstation_cost}-{birthday_money}-{christmas_money}={money_needed}>>{money_needed}
He needs to sell {games_to_sell} games because {money_needed} / {game_price} = <<{money_needed}/{game_price}={games_to_sell}>>{games_to_sell}
